# [Interview #75: ACOS Signing Report - Erica Sadun, Entry #7](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=75#7)

#### Question

Once and for all end the ageless look thing. Is it obvious that it is tied to the Oath Rod?

#### Robert Jordan

RAFO.
